required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long-term Observational Study to Evaluation the Safety of FURESTEM-RA Inj(K0202)
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Open, Long-term Follow-up Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of FURESTEM-RA Inj. in Patients With Moderate to Severe Rheumatoid Arthritis : 5-year Results From the K0202 Extension Study

brief_summary.textblock: Long-term Observational Study to Evaluation the Safety of FURESTEM-RA Inj(K0202)

detailed_description.textblock: A Multi-center, Open, Long-term Follow-up Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of FURESTEM-RA Inj. in Patients With Moderate to Severe Rheumatoid arthritis: 5-year Results From the K0202 Extension Study

primary_outcome.description: (Rate of Adverse Event, Number of Participants with Adverse Event)

secondary_outcome.measure: 1. Efficacy as measured by ACR(American College of Rheumatology)20,50,70 reaction rate
2. Efficacy as measured by EULAR (European League Against Rheumatism)reaction rate
change in DAS(Disease activity scores)28-ESR from baseline
secondary_outcome.description: DAS range is from ≥ 3.2 (inactive) , ＞3.2 but ≤ 5.1(moderate), ＞5.1(very active)

secondary_outcome.measure: change in KHAQ(Korean Health assessment questionnaire) from baseline
change in CDAI (clinical disease activity index) from baseline
change in 100mm Pain VAS(Visual analogue scale) from baseline
secondary_outcome.description: 100mm Pain VAS range is from 0 (clear) to 100 (severe)

secondary_outcome.measure: change in Modified Sharp/Van der Heijde Socre from baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Modified Sharp/Van der Heijde Socre range is from 0 (clear) to 448 (severe)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Subject who enrolled K0202 Clinical Trial(parent study) and has been given more than one medication.
2. Subjects who understand and voluntarily sign an informed consent form
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Any other condition which the investigator judges would make patient unsuitable for study participation

facility.name: Seoul national University Boramae medical center
